docs.snippet: Jose Pekerman didn't have many friends or supporters in Colombia when he accepted the job as national coach in 2012.
docs.lead_paragraph: Jose Pekerman didn't have many friends or supporters in Colombia when he accepted the job as national coach in 2012.

headline.main: Pekerman Returns to World Cup With Colombia
headline.print_headline: Pekerman Returns to World Cup With Colombia

docs.snippet: Didier Drogba may be looking at his best chance of reaching the knockout stage in what will surely be the aging striker's final World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Didier Drogba may be looking at his best chance of reaching the knockout stage in what will surely be the aging striker's final World Cup.

headline.main: Last Chance for Didier Drogba on Biggest Stage
headline.print_headline: Last Chance for Didier Drogba on Biggest Stage

docs.snippet: With three former champions in Italy, England and Uruguay, plus unpredictable Costa Rica, Group D could be the World Cup's toughest.
docs.lead_paragraph: With three former champions in Italy, England and Uruguay, plus unpredictable Costa Rica, Group D could be the World Cup's toughest.

headline.main: Italy, England and Uruguay Lead Group of Champions
headline.print_headline: Italy, England and Uruguay Lead Group of Champions

docs.snippet: Diego Forlan recorded a television commercial recently wearing a T-shirt that read: "We're not the favorites, nor will we be a surprise. We are the team that no one wants to draw."
docs.lead_paragraph: Diego Forlan recorded a television commercial recently wearing a T-shirt that read: "We're not the favorites, nor will we be a surprise. We are the team that no one wants to draw."

headline.main: Uruguay: The Small Country Nobody Wants to Face
headline.print_headline: Uruguay: The Small Country Nobody Wants to Face

docs.snippet: To say that Uruguay coach Oscar Tabarez has been around would be an understatement.
docs.lead_paragraph: To say that Uruguay coach Oscar Tabarez has been around would be an understatement.

headline.main: 'El Maestro' Tabarez Leads Uruguay at World Cup
headline.print_headline: 'El Maestro' Tabarez Leads Uruguay at World Cup

docs.snippet: Although Uruguay is a small country with only 3.2 million people, it has produced some big talent.
docs.lead_paragraph: Although Uruguay is a small country with only 3.2 million people, it has produced some big talent.

headline.main: Uruguay Led by Luis Suarez and Edinson Cavani
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Led by Luis Suarez and Edinson Cavani

docs.snippet: Despite qualifying for the World Cup with the best defensive record in CONCACAF, Costa Rica is still a heavy underdog to get out of a group containing England, Italy and Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite qualifying for the World Cup with the best defensive record in CONCACAF, Costa Rica is still a heavy underdog to get out of a group containing England, Italy and Uruguay.

headline.main: Costa Rica Hopes Defense Can Hold Up in World Cup
headline.print_headline: Costa Rica Hopes Defense Can Hold Up in World Cup

docs.snippet: Costa Rica coach Jorge Luis Pinto will need every bit of his tactical know-how if he is to lead the Central American nation out of Group D at the World Cup, where the team will play Italy, England and Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: Costa Rica coach Jorge Luis Pinto will need every bit of his tactical know-how if he is to lead the Central American nation out of Group D at the World Cup, where the team will play Italy, England and Uruguay.

headline.main: Costa Rica Coach Pinto Is a Student of the Game
headline.print_headline: Costa Rica Coach Pinto Is a Student of the Game

docs.snippet: Three of the teams in Group D are loaded with famous players, like Italy striker Mario Balotelli, England forward Wayne Rooney and Uruguay striker Luis Suarez. The odd one out is Costa Rica.
docs.lead_paragraph: Three of the teams in Group D are loaded with famous players, like Italy striker Mario Balotelli, England forward Wayne Rooney and Uruguay striker Luis Suarez. The odd one out is Costa Rica.

headline.main: 5 Costa Rica Players to Watch at the World Cup
headline.print_headline: 5 Costa Rica Players to Watch at the World Cup

docs.snippet: Never before has England traveled to a World Cup better prepared — for the post-tournament inquest.

headline.main: Even Before WCup, England Geared Up for Failure
